text:
@TheSun @piersmorgan They tell you to have social awareness, skills, knowledge and communication skills, in order to get a Job.

The only armour most people have these days is verbal dexterity.  A Government Minister said she hasn't heard of coronavirus crisis plan Operation Cygnus? 😥
